item.title: 【Creating Scrolling Text With HTML, CSS, and JavaScript】使用 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 创建滚动文本
item.description:
【

When you’ve been building web applications for over 25 years, as I have done, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript has become second nature. 

In this article, I’ll show you some simple ways to create scrolling text using these tools, including five different methods for coding scrolling text with plain HTML, HTML and CSS, and finally, HTML + CSS + JS.

】

当您构建 Web 应用程序超过 25 年时（正如我所做的那样），使用 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 已经成为第二天性。 

在本文中，我将向您展示一些使用这些工具创建滚动文本的简单方法，包括使用 纯 HTML、HTML 和 CSS ，最后是 HTML + CSS + JS。

item.title: 【Structured Logging in Spring Boot 3.4 for Improved Logs】Spring Boot 3.4 中的结构化日志记录可改进日志
item.description:
【

Structured logging has become essential in modern applications to simplify the analysis of logs and improve observability. Spring Boot 3.4 extends the logging capabilities of Spring Framework 6.2. This can be easily configured log formats using application.yml or application.properties.

Before jumping into the details of the improvements, below is a brief on how structured logging has evolved, with comparisons between traditional logging and structured logging in Spring Framework 6.2 and Spring Boot 3.4.

】

结构化日志记录在现代应用程序中已变得至关重要，可以简化日志分析并提高可观察性。 Spring Boot 3.4 扩展了 Spring Framework 6.2 的日志记录功能。可以使用 application.yml 或 application.properties 轻松配置日志格式。

在详细介绍改进的细节之前，下面简要介绍了结构化日志记录的演变过程，以及传统日志记录和 Spring Framework 6.2 和 Spring Boot 3.4 中的结构化日志记录。

item.title: 【Azure Web Apps: Seamless Deployments With Deployment Slots】Azure Web Apps：使用部署槽进行无缝部署
item.description:
【

Suppose you work for a healthcare company that provides its services via a web platform. The user interface for this platform is set up as a PHP web app hosted in Azure App Services. Frequent updates to the app's source code are rolled out to production to enhance features or address bugs. However, these updates sometimes introduce problems:

  • Undetected bugs: Despite rigorous testing, testers occasionally miss critical bugs, leading to issues in the production environment.
  • Downtime: When bugs are identified, rolling back changes causes service interruptions, which frustrates end-users.
  • Slow deployments: The deployment and compilation process affects app responsiveness, especially during peak usage times, leading to user dissatisfaction.

Is there a better solution to ensure seamless updates without interrupting the services? Yes! Microsoft Azure offers a powerful feature known as deployment slots.

】

假设您在一家通过网络平台提供服务的医疗保健公司工作。该平台的用户界面设置为托管在 Azure 应用服务中的 PHP Web 应用程序。应用程序源代码的频繁更新会推广到生产环境，以增强功能或解决错误。 但是，这些更新有时会带来问题：

  • 未检测到的错误： 尽管进行了严格的测试，测试人员仍偶尔会错过关键错误，从而导致生产环境中出现问题。跨度>
  • 停机：当发现错误时，回滚更改会导致服务中断，这会让最终用户感到沮丧。< /里>
  • 部署缓慢： 部署和编译过程会影响应用响应速度，尤其是在使用高峰期，从而导致用户不满意。

是否有更好的解决方案来确保无缝更新而不中断服务？是的！ Microsoft Azure 提供了一项强大的功能，称为d部署槽位。

item.title: 【5 Key Steps for a Successful Cloud Migration Strategy】成功云迁移策略的 5 个关键步骤
item.description:
【

If you have not remodeled your business to the cloud, you have stayed behind your competitors. The first step towards optimizing business strategy is cloud migration. 80% of companies, from small to large, have shifted their services to the cloud. 

Cloud migration can enhance data security, functionality, scalability, and customer service and reduce costs. Businesses can store their data, software applications, and more components in the cloud. However, migration from one cloud to another or from local data centers to the cloud requires the right strategy to be considered. 

】

如果您尚未将业务转型至云端，那么您就已经落后了你的竞争对手。优化业务策略的第一步是云迁移。 80% 的公司，无论规模大小，都已将其服务转移到云端。 

云迁移 可以增强数据安全性、功能性、可扩展性和客户服务并降低成本。企业可以在其中存储数据、软件应用应用程序和更多组件在云中。然而，从一个云迁移到另一个云或从本地数据中心迁移到云需要考虑正确的策略。

item.title: 【Build Your Own GitHub-Like Tool With React in One Hour】一小时内使用 React 构建您自己的类似 GitHub 的工具
item.description:
【

GitHub is a widely used platform for version control and collaboration, enabling developers to store, manage, and share code repositories. It supports Git, a distributed version control system that allows multiple contributors to work on projects simultaneously. With features like pull requests, issue tracking, and code reviews, GitHub has become a vital tool for open-source and professional software development.

Introduction

Howdy! I’m Maulik Suchak, the creator of this project, and I’m excited to introduce you to my GitHub web application. MyGitHub is a public web app built for browsing repositories under specific organizations and diving into their commit histories.

】

GitHub 是一个广泛使用的版本控制和协作平台，使开发人员能够存储、管理和共享代码存储库。它支持 Git，这是一种分布式版本控制系统，允许多个贡献者同时处理项目。凭借拉取请求、问题跟踪和代码审查等功能，GitHub 已成为开源和专业软件开发的重要工具。

简介

你好！我是 Maulik Suchak，这个项目的创建者，我很高兴向您介绍我的 GitHub< /a> 网络应用程序。 MyGitHub 是一个公共 Web 应用程序，用于浏览特定环境下的存储库组织并深入研究他们的提交历史。

item.title: 【How to Design Event Streams, Part 3】如何设计事件流，第 3 部分
item.description:
【

See previous Part 1 and Part 2.

The relationship between your event definitions and the event streams themselves is a major design. One of the most common questions I get is, “Is it okay to put multiple event types in one stream? Or should we publish each event type to its own stream?”

】

请参阅之前的第 1 部分和第 2 部分。

事件定义与事件流本身之间的关系是一项主要设计。我最常见的问题之一是，“可以将多种事件类型放入一个流中吗？或者我们应该将每种事件类型发布到其自己的流中？”

item.title: 【Development of a Truck Tracker and Delivery Services Software】卡车跟踪和送货服务软件的开发
item.description:
【

As the logistics industry evolves, it requires advanced solutions to streamline operations and enhance efficiency. This case study explores the development of a truck tracker cum delivery services software built using React Native, RESTful APIs, and SQLite. The software caters to both drivers and management, providing features such as route mapping, delivery status updates, and real-time tracking.

Objective

The primary goal was to create a comprehensive logistics management tool that enables:

】

随着物流行业的发展，它需要先进的解决方案来简化运营并提高效率。本案例研究探讨了使用 React Native、RESTful API 和 SQLite 构建的卡车跟踪器兼送货服务软件的开发。该软件同时满足司机和管理人员的需求，提供路线图、送货状态更新和实时跟踪等功能。

目标

主要目标是创建一个全面的物流管理工具，能够：

item.title: 【COM Design Pattern for Automation With Selenium and Cucumber】使用 Selenium 和 Cucumber 实现自动化的 COM 设计模式
item.description:
【

The Component Object Model (COM) is a design pattern that allows you to structure tests in test automation projects. Inspired by the popular Page Object Model (POM), COM goes beyond handling entire pages and focuses on specific UI components, such as buttons, text fields, dropdown menus, or other reusable elements.

In this tutorial, we will explain how to implement COM to test a web application with Selenium WebDriver and Cucumber and how this approach can make your tests more flexible, modular, and easier to maintain.

】

组件对象模型 (COM) 是一种设计模式，允许您在测试自动化项目中构建测试。受流行的页面对象模型 (POM) 的启发，COM 不仅仅只处理整个页面，还专注于特定的 UI 组件，例如按钮、文本字段、下拉菜单或其他可重用元素。

在本教程中，我们将解释如何实现 COM 来使用 Selenium WebDriver 和 Cucumber 以及这种方法如何使您的测试更加灵活、模块化并且更易于维护。

item.title: 【Multi-Cluster Kubernetes Sealed Secrets Management in Jenkins】Jenkins 中的多集群 Kubernetes 密封秘密管理
item.description:
【

The Jenkins pipeline below automates the secure management of Kubernetes sealed secrets across multiple environments and clusters, including AKS (Non-Production), GKE (Production Cluster 1), and EKS (Production Cluster 2). It dynamically adapts based on the selected environment, processes secrets in parallel for scalability, and ensures secure storage of credentials and artifacts. 

With features like dynamic cluster mapping, parallel execution, and post-build artifact archiving, the pipeline is optimized for efficiency, security, and flexibility in a multi-cloud Kubernetes landscape.

】

下面的 Jenkins 管道可跨多个环境和集群自动安全管理 Kubernetes 密封机密，包括 AKS（非生产）、GKE（生产集群 1） 和EKS（生产集群2）。它根据所选环境进行动态调整，并行处理机密以实现可扩展性，并确保凭证和工件的安全存储。 

凭借动态集群映射、并行执行和构建后工件归档等功能，管道针对多云中的效率、安全性和灵活性进行了优化Kubernetes 景观。

item.title: 【Choose a Database With Hybrid Vector Search for AI Apps】为 AI 应用程序选择具有混合矢量搜索的数据库
item.description:
【

More and more, we see data pipelines being built to move and prepare data for AI use cases. To avoid being too buzzwordy, we'll define "AI use-cases" for this article as "RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) applications" to provide documents for a 'chat’-like application. The goal is to "augment" the question you will be posting to an LLM (like ChatGPT) with additional content you "retrieved," e.g.:

C
  
You are a helpful in-store assistant.   Your #1 goal in life is to 
help our employees and customers find what they need.

Some helpful context is:
{{ relevant_documents }}

Your task is to answer the question: 
{{ prompt }}

Please don’t make things up. Only return answers based on the 
context provided in this prompt.


】

我们越来越多地看到正在构建数据管道来为人工智能用例移动和准备数据。为了避免过于流行，我们将本文的“人工智能用例”定义为“RAG（检索增强生成）应用程序”，为类似“聊天”的应用程序提供文档。目标是通过您“检索”的附加内容来“增强”您将发布到 LLM（例如 ChatGPT）的问题，例如：

C
  
您是一位乐于助人的店内助理。   你人生的第一目标是 
帮助我们的员工和客户找到他们需要的东西。

一些有用的背景是：
{{相关文档}}

你的任务是回答以下问题： 
{{ 迅速的 }}

请不要编造事情。仅根据以下内容返回答案 
此提示中提供了上下文。
